title: Modifications of the charge–discharge behaviour of Fe2(MoO4)3 in all-solid-state lithium-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18109-18116
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03058C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuta Kimura, Shintaro Kobayashi, Shogo Kawaguchi, Koji Ohara, Yasuhiro Suzuki, Takashi Nakamura, Yasutoshi Iriyama, Koji Amezawa
Operando X-ray diffraction measurements revealed that Fe2(MO4)3 electrode thin films on solid electrolytes possess an expanded solid-solution reaction region and narrower two-phase reaction region compared to those in liquid electrolytes.
